statements: SELECT * FROM machinery_tracking;
SELECT machine_id, location_point FROM machinery_tracking WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM machinery_tracking WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location_point, timestamp FROM machinery_tracking WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT machine_id, location_point FROM machinery_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM machinery_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(id) FROM machinery_tracking GROUP BY machine_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5
SELECT id, ST_AsText(location_point) AS location FROM machinery_tracking WHERE ST_Y(location_point) > 40
SELECT * FROM machinery_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, machine_id, timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS utc_timestamp FROM machinery_tracking LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM equipment_tracking;
SELECT id, equipment_id, timestamp FROM equipment_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM equipment_tracking WHERE id = 5;
SELECT machinery_id, machinery_type FROM machinery WHERE machinery_type = 'Excavator';
SELECT * FROM machinery ORDER BY last_known_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_tracking ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_id, timestamp FROM equipment_tracking WHERE id > 10 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machinery_id, machinery_type FROM machinery WHERE machinery_type='Excavator' ORDER BY machinery_id;
SELECT * FROM machinery WHERE last_known_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT machinery_id, last_known_location FROM machinery JOIN equipment_tracking ON machinery.id = equipment_tracking.id WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM farm_machinery;
SELECT machinery_id, gps_location FROM farm_machinery;
SELECT * FROM machinery_activity WHERE activity_type = 'harvesting';
SELECT machinery_id, activity_time FROM machinery_activity ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT machinery_id, MAX(activity_time) AS latest_activity FROM machinery_activity GROUP BY machinery_id;
SELECT * FROM farm_machinery ORDER BY gps_location DESC
SELECT machinery_id, gps_location, last_update FROM farm_machinery WHERE machinery_id = 3
SELECT activity_id, activity_time FROM machinery_activity WHERE activity_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY activity_time DESC
SELECT machinery_id, COUNT(history_id) AS num_history_entries FROM machinery_history GROUP BY machinery_id HAVING num_history_entries > 5
SELECT * FROM machinery_activity INNER JOIN farm_machinery ON machinery_activity.machinery_id = farm_machinery.machinery_id
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT id, sensor_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT machinery_name, manufacturer FROM machinery WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT id, machinery_id, location_id, timestamp FROM machinery_location ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensor WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machinery_name, manufacturer, year FROM machinery WHERE year > 2010;

SELECT machinery_name, latitude, longitude FROM machinery JOIN machinery_location ON machinery.id = machinery_location.machinery_id JOIN location_data ON location_data.id = machinery_location.location_id WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensor WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' OR sensor_type = 'Humidity';
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -100 AND -90 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM machinery_locations LIMIT 5
SELECT id, machinery_id, latitude FROM machinery_locations ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM machinery_status WHERE machinery_id = 3
SELECT id, status, timestamp FROM machinery_status WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT machinery_id, sensor_type, location FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_type IN ('temperature', 'humidity') ORDER BY machinery_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM machinery_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM machinery_locations WHERE machinery_id = 1
SELECT machinery_id, status FROM machinery_status WHERE status = 'active' AND machinery_id IN (2, 4)
SELECT id, route_description FROM machinery_routes WHERE route_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM machinery_sensors WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%'
